0.text: Innate: When Draven catches a  Spinning Axe, kills a non-champion, or destroys a  turret, he gains a stack of Adoration.

1.text: In addition, killing a  minion or destroying a  ward or  trap grants a  Strike stack for 10 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. If he drops an  axe or a nearby  minion dies without Draven killing it he loses all Strike stacks. At 6 stacks, he consumes all of his Strike stacks and gains 2 Adoration stacks.

2.text: When Draven kills an enemy  champion, he consumes all of his Adoration stacks and gains  40 + (2.5 × stacks) bonus gold.

3.text: Draven loses 75% of his Adoration stacks upon death.

0.text: Active: Draven starts spinning his axe, causing his next basic attack within 5.8 seconds to deal bonus physical damage.

1.text: The axe ricochets off the target high up into the air, landing 2 seconds later at a location determined by Draven's current movement. If Draven catches an axe, Spinning Axe is reapplied for no additional cost on his next basic attack.

2.text: Draven can hold up to two Spinning Axes in his hands at once.

0.text: Active: Draven enters an adrenaline rush, gaining  bonus attack speed for 3 seconds,  bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds that decays over the duration, and  ghosting for 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Catching a  Spinning Axe  resets Blood Rush's cooldown.

0.text: Active: Draven throws a fan of axes in a line in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit,  knocking them aside, though not through terrain, and  slowing them for 2 seconds.

Active: Draven hurls two massive axes in the target direction that briefly grant  sight of the area along their path and deal physical damage to enemies hit. This  executes enemy  champions with  health that would be left within the current number of  League of Draven stacks.

1.text: Whirling Death can be recast after 1 second while the axes are traveling, and does so automatically after the axes hit an enemy  champion or the edge of the map.

2.text: Recast: The axes reverse direction, slowly coming to a stop before homing back to Draven, dealing the same damage to enemies hit along the way back.

3.text: Whirling Death deals 100% − 40% (based on enemies hit) damage, resetting upon reversing direction.
